title: Bug 103963: No friendly error message displayed when there is no data for a series
description: Currently, when there is no data available for a series, the application does not display a friendly error message to notify the user.
OB: When there is no data for a series, the application does not provide a friendly error message to alert the user.
EB: When there is no data for a series, the application should display a friendly error message to inform the user about the absence of data.
SR:
1. Launch the application.
2. Navigate to the series that currently has no available data.
3. Observe if a friendly error message is displayed regarding the absence of data for the series.
